Action.Name: Index
Action.Title: 列表

Command.Name: 列表页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <IndexPageActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="IndexPage"> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="toolbar-panel" PageID="P01095"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-create" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-add',plain:true" Title="新增" ActionValue="8" Action="showActDlg('新增','/Page/P01095/Create',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-edit" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="修改" ActionValue="16" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','修改','/Page/P01095/Edit',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-delete" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel',plain:true" Title="删除" ActionValue="32" Action="showActDlg_DGItemsConfirm('datagrid','删除','确认删除选择项？','/Page/P01095/Delete',400,300)" /> <UIButton /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> <DataGrid Tag="table" ID="datagrid" Class="easyui-datagrid" Options="url:'/Page/P01095/Query',fitColumns:true,fit:true,pagination: true,rownumbers: true,nowrap: true,striped: true,collapsible: false,resizable:true,onClickRow:oncheckstate,onSelect:oncheckstate,onCheck:oncheckstate,onCheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheck:oncheckstate,onUnselect:oncheckstate" Key="UnitID"> <Column Title="UnitID" FieldName="UnitID" IsCheckBox="true" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="单位名称" FieldName="UnitName" /> </DataGrid> </Page> </IndexPageActionCommand>

Action.Name: Query
Action.Title: 检索

Command.Name: 查询总数
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[检索分页].Json

Action.Command: <ScalarCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="分页查询" GroupName="固定资产" TableName="zc_Unit" CommandName="QueryCount" SqlType="Scalar" />

Command.Name: 分页查询
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[检索分页].Json

Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="搜索结果" GroupName="固定资产" TableName="zc_Unit" CommandName="QueryPage"> <Parameter Name="Page" Path="Request[Page]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Rows" Path="Request[Rows]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="total" Path="Results[查询总数].Value" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="rows" Path="Results[分页查询].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="LastResult.IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="LastResult.ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: Create
Action.Title: 新增

Command.Name: 新增页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="单位名称" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="UnitName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入单位名称',validType:'length[1,10]',invalidMessage:'单位名称不得超过10字符'" Binding="UnitName" Length="10" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01095"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-add" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="8" Action="submitAct_DGAppend('dataform','/Page/P01095/Add','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Add
Action.Title: 新增

Command.Name: 执行新增
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[执行新增].Json

Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="新增结果" GroupName="固定资产" TableName="zc_Unit" CommandName="Add" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="UnitID" Path="SerialCode" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="ZCUnit,U,6" /> <Parameter Name="UnitName" Path="Request[UnitName]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行新增].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行新增].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行新增].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: Edit
Action.Title: 编辑
Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="编辑页面" GroupName="固定资产" TableName="zc_Unit" CommandName="GetEdit"> <Parameter Name="UnitID" Path="Request[ID]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

Command.Name: 编辑页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="LastResult.Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" DataBinding="Parameters[Data]"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="UnitID" FieldType="Hidden"> <Input Tag="input" Name="UnitID" Class="edit-input" InputType="hidden" Binding="UnitID" Length="6" IsHidden="true" /> </Field> <Field Title="单位名称" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="UnitName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入单位名称',validType:'length[1,10]',invalidMessage:'单位名称不得超过10字符'" Binding="UnitName" Length="50" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01095"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-update" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="16" Action="submitAct_DGUpdate('dataform','/Page/P01095/Update','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Update
Action.Title: 编辑

Command.Name: 执行更新
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[执行更新].Json

Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="编辑结果" GroupName="固定资产" TableName="zc_Unit" CommandName="Update" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="UnitID" Path="Request[UnitID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="UnitName" Path="Request[UnitName]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="IsActive" Path="Request[IsActive]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行更新].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行更新].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行更新].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: Delete
Action.Title: 删除

Command.Name: 执行删除
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[执行删除].Json

Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="删除结果" GroupName="固定资产" TableName="zc_Unit" CommandName="Delete" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="Keys" Path="Request[Keys]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行删除].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行删除].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行删除].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>
